##### FILE: mon_api_deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mon-api-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mon_api
  name: mon-api-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mon_api
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mon_api
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: mon-api-secret
        image: dockersebc/datascientest-exam-kubernetes-1:latest
        name: mon-api-conteneurs
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
      restartPolicy: Always

---

    #logpath=/data/mongodb/mongodb.log

    directoryperdb=true
    logappend=true
    bind_ip=0.0.0.0
    port=27017

  name: mongo-config

##### FILE: mongo_all_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        name: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - exec mongod -f /data/mongodb/conf/mongodb.conf
        image: mongo:4.2.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: mongodb
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/mongodb/conf/
          name: mongo-config
        - mountPath: /data/mongodb/
          name: data
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mongo-config
        name: mongo-config
      - hostPath:
          path: /data/mongodb/
        name: data

---

##### FILE: mongo_depl.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---

##### FILE: mongo_expr.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongodb-configmap
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

---

##### FILE: mongo_express2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongodb-configmap
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ENABLE_ADMIN
          value: "true"
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

---

##### FILE: mongo_sfs.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-persistent-storage-claim
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-pvc
  updateStrategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      partition: 0
    type: RollingUpdate

---

##### FILE: mongodb_deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---

##### FILE: mongodb_deployment1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/jobs-manager-mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: jobs-manager-mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: jobs-manager-mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: jobs-manager-mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-username
              name: jobs-manager-credentials
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-password
              name: jobs-manager-credentials
        image: mongo:latest
        name: jobs-manager-mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongodb_editor_role.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/mongodb-editor-role:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: gobackup-operator
  name: mongodb-editor-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - gobackup.io
  resources:
  - mongodbs
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - gobackup.io
  resources:
  - mongodbs/status
  verbs:
  - get

---

  hostPath:

##### FILE: mongodb_StatefullSet.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  serviceName: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: devdb
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: devdb@123
        image: mongo
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongops
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongops
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

##### FILE: mongodb12.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-pwd
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo:4.4.6
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-volume
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongodb16_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mymicroservices/StatefulSet/mongodb-server-state:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb-server-state
  name: mongodb-server-state
  namespace: mymicroservices
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb-server
  serviceName: mongodb-server-svc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb-server
      name: mongodb-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MONGO_USER
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MONGO_PASSWORD
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mongodb-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: "0.2"
            memory: 200Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-volume
      namespace: mymicroservices
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:

      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:

              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret

##### FILE: MongoDb21_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongostatefulset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongostatefulset
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  serviceName: mongo-svc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
        environment: test
        replicaset: MainRepSet
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - mongod
        - --bind_ip
        - 0.0.0.0
        - --replSet
        - MainRepSet
        image: mongo
        name: mongo-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 200Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-pv-claim
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      annotations:
        volume.beta.kubernetes.io/storage-class: default
      name: mongo-pv-claim
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 2Gi
      volumeMode: Filesystem

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to vertx/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: vertx
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database-name
              name: mongodb
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database-user
              name: mongodb
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database-password
              name: mongodb
        image: mongo:5.0
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---

      env: dev
  serviceName: mongosvc
  template:

        apptype: db
        env: dev
      name: dbtemp
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: sudarshanlnx/mongo:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: dbcon
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: mongo
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: dbvolume
      volumes:
      - name: dbvolume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: devpvc
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 5Gi

##### FILE: mongodb25.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-pod:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
      tier: db
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mongo
        tier: db
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: raja
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: Raja@123
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /data
        name: mongo-volume

---

        name: mongodb

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-pwd
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo:4.4.6
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-volume
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-pvc

##### FILE: mongodb30_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb-svc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: admin
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongodb-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

##### FILE: mongodb33_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --dbpath
        - /data/db
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE
          value: Library
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: USERNAME
              name: mongo-credentials
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: PASSWORD
              name: mongo-credentials
        image: mongo
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: 27017
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: mongo
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: 27017
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-data-dir
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-data-dir
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc-mongodb

---


Mutation:

        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: mongoadmin
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-paaword
              name: catalog-secrets
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

##### FILE: mongodb44.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/mongodb:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - sleep
    - "7200"
    env:
    - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
      valueFrom:
        secretKeyRef:
          key: username
          name: mongo-creds
    - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
      valueFrom:
        secretKeyRef:
          key: password
          name: mongo-creds
    image: mongo:4.4.19-rc0-focal
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    name: mongodb
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: "1"
        memory: 500M
      requests:
        cpu: "1"
        memory: 500M
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /data
      name: cephfs-shared-team-name
  restartPolicy: Always
  volumes:
  - name: cephfs-shared-team-name
    persistentVolumeClaim:
      claimName: cephfs-shared-team

---

##### FILE: mongodb52.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - mongodb
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: mongo:4.4
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongodb59.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mongo-setup/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: mongo-setup
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---

##### FILE: mongodb60_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
      service: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        consul.hashicorp.com/connect-inject: "true"
      labels:
        app: mongodb
        service: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: root
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: mongodb
        image: mongo
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mongodb/data
          name: mongodata
      serviceAccountName: mongodb
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: mongodata

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb-svc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: admin
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongodb-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret-statefulset
        image: mongo
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-volume
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

  namespace: mymicroservices
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb-server
  serviceName: mongodb-server-svc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb-server
      name: mongodb-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MONGO_USER
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MONGO_PASSWORD
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mongodb-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: "0.2"
            memory: 200Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-volume
      namespace: mymicroservices
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

              key: mongo-username

          name: mongodb-data-dir
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: ghcr-secret
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-data-dir
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-pvc

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        k8up.io/backupcommand: mongodump --archive -uroot -pexample
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: root
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: example
        image: mongo
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          protocol: TCP
        resources: {}
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
        node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane: ""
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext: {}
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb

---

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to devproject/StatefulSet/mongoinst:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongoinst
  namespace: devproject
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:

      env: dev
  serviceName: mongosvc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        apptype: db
        env: dev
      name: dbtemp
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: sudarshanlnx/mongo:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: dbcon
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: mongo
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: dbvolume
      volumes:
      - name: dbvolume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: devpvc
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 5Gi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

##### FILE: mongodbbackup.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/mongodb-backup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: mongodb-backup
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - bash
        - -c
        - cat /cred/mongo-certs/tls.crt /cred/mongo-certs/tls.key > /work-dir/mongo.pem;
          cat /cred/cluster-ca/tls.crt /cred/cluster-ca/tls.key > /work-dir/ca.pem;
          mongodump --oplog --out /dump/dump --host mongodb:$MONGODB_SERVICE_PORT
          --username $ADMIN_USER --password $ADMIN_PASSWORD --authenticationDatabase
          admin --ssl --sslCAFile /work-dir/ca.pem --sslPEMKeyFile /work-dir/mongo.pem
        env:
        - name: ADMIN_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: user
              name: icp-mongodb-admin
        - name: ADMIN_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: icp-mongodb-admin
        image: $ibm_mongodb_image
        name: cs-mongodb-backup
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /work-dir
          name: tmp-mongodb
        - mountPath: /dump
          name: mongodump
        - mountPath: /cred/mongo-certs
          name: icp-mongodb-client-cert
        - mountPath: /cred/cluster-ca
          name: cluster-ca-cert
      restartPolicy: Never
      serviceAccountName: ibm-mongodb-operand
      volumes:
      - name: mongodump
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: cs-mongodump
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp-mongodb
      - name: icp-mongodb-client-cert
        secret:
          secretName: icp-mongodb-client-cert
      - name: cluster-ca-cert
        secret:
          secretName: mongodb-root-ca-cert

---

          valueFrom:

              key: user

            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: icp-mongodb-admin

        name: cs-mongodb-backup
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /work-dir
          name: tmp-mongodb
        - mountPath: /dump
          name: mongodump

        - mountPath: /cred/cluster-ca

      - name: cluster-ca-cert

          secretName: mongodb-root-ca-cert

kind: Job

  namespace: default

  template:
    metadata:

          admin

          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: user
              name: icp-mongodb-admin
        - name: ADMIN_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: icp-mongodb-admin

      - name: cluster-ca-cert

  MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD: root
  MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME: root
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: mongo-config
  namespace: default

##### FILE: mongoDBDeployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --dbpath
        - /data/db
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: admin
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: admin
        image: mongo
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /data
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: mongo-volume

---

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment39.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to hackfest/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo
  namespace: hackfest
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --dbpath
        - /data/db
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-creds
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-creds
        image: mongo
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongo
            - --disableImplicitSessions
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: mongo
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongo
            - --disableImplicitSessions
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-data-dir
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-data-dir
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-data

---


Mutation:

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-storage
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: your-namespace-name
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: your-username
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: your-password
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --dbpath
        - /data/db
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-creds
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-creds
        image: mongo:4.4.6
        name: mongo
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-data-dir
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-data-dir
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-data

---

    app: mongo

      app: mongo
  strategy: {}

    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --dbpath
        - /data/db
        image: mongo
        name: mongo
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-data-dir
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-data-dir
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc-mongo

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment52.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - typescript-app
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: admin
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: admin
        image: mongo
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mongodb
          name: mongodb-data
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-data-pvc

---

kind: PersistentVolumeClaim

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment53.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --dbpath
        - /data/db
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-creds
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-creds
        image: mongo
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongo
            - --disableImplicitSessions
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: mongo
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongo
            - --disableImplicitSessions
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-data-dir
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-data-dir
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc

---


Mutation:

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment57.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data
      volumes:
      - gcePersistentDisk:
          fsType: ext4
          pdName: mongodb
        name: mongodb-data

---

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment58.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: custom-mongo:latest
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment59.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment61.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: mongodb-data

---

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment65.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mongo/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo
  namespace: mongo
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --dbpath
        - /data/db
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-creds
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-creds
        image: mongo
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongosh
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: mongo
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongosh
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-data-dir
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/hostname: blackbox
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-data-dir
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-data

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource mongo/Deployment/mongo failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource mongo/Deployment/mongo failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

        name: db

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
      storageClassName: standard

---

    app: mongodb

  namespace: default

  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:

        app: mongodb

      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE

            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database-name
              name: mongodb
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database-user
              name: mongodb
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database-password
              name: mongodb
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment72_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 3Gi
      storageClassName: storage-class

---

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment75.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: mongodb
    name: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: mongodb
      name: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: mongodb
        name: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: BITNAMI_DEBUG
          value: "false"
        - name: ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD
          value: "yes"
        - name: MONGODB_SYSTEM_LOG_VERBOSITY
          value: "0"
        - name: MONGODB_DISABLE_SYSTEM_LOG
          value: "no"
        - name: MONGODB_ENABLE_IPV6
          value: "no"
        - name: MONGODB_ENABLE_DIRECTORY_PER_DB
          value: "no"
        image: docker.io/bitnami/mongodb:4.4.4-debian-10-r0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongo
            - --disableImplicitSessions
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: mongodb
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - bash
            - -ec
            - |
              mongo --disableImplicitSessions $TLS_OPTIONS --eval 'db.hello().isWritablePrimary || db.hello().secondary' | grep -q 'true'
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits: {}
          requests: {}
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /bitnami/mongodb/data/db/
          name: datadir
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1001
        sysctls: []
      serviceAccountName: mongodb
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: datadir
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 6Gi

---

##### FILE: mongodb-deployment76.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: myUserAdmin
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: abc123
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongodb-express.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongodb-configmap
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

---

##### FILE: mongodb-f_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb-svc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: bjnandi/mongodb:v1.0.1
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
      storageClassName: ebs-sc

---

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
  name: mongo-ingress
  namespace: mongo-setup
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: mongo-express.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: mongo-express-service
            port:
              number: 8081
        path: /
        pathType: Exact

##### FILE: mongodb-init-job.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/mongodb-init-job:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: mongodb-init-job
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      name: mongodb-init-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - mongosh
        - --host
        - mongodb-0.mongodb-svc.default.svc.cluster.local
        - --authenticationDatabase
        - admin
        - --username
        - admin
        - --password
        - $(MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD)
        - /mongo-init-script/init-script.js
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb-init-container
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mongo-init-script
          name: mongo-init-script
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mongodb-init-script
        name: mongo-init-script

---


Mutation:

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/mongodb:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: mongodb

metadata:

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota

    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"

    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

  namespace: mongodb

      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: mongodb
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/mongodb:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: mongodb
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/mongodb:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          name: mongodb-config
    - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          name: mongodb-config
    image: mongo:latest
    name: mongodb
    ports:
    - containerPort: 27017
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /data/db
      name: mongo-persistent-storage
  volumes:
  - name: mongo-persistent-storage
    persistentVolumeClaim:
      claimName: mongodb-pvc

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/mongodb-aws:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: mongodb-aws
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: mongo
    name: mongodb
    ports:
    - containerPort: 27017
      protocol: TCP
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /data/db
      name: mongodb-data
  volumes:
  - awsElasticBlockStore:
      fsType: ext4
      volumeID: my-volume
    name: mongodb-data

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/mongodb:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - envFrom:
    - configMapRef:
        name: mongodb-config
      prefix: MONGO
    image: mongo:latest
    name: mongodb
    ports:
    - containerPort: 27017
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /data/db
      name: mongo-persistent-storage
  volumes:
  - name: mongo-persistent-storage
    persistentVolumeClaim:
      claimName: mongodb-pvc

##### FILE: mongodb-Pod-configmap-iter.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/mongodb:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          name: mongodb-config
    - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          name: mongodb-config
    image: mongo:latest
    name: mongodb
    ports:
    - containerPort: 27017
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /data/db
      name: mongo-persistent-storage
  volumes:
  - name: mongo-persistent-storage
    persistentVolumeClaim:
      claimName: mongodb-pvc

kind: Pod

  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: mongo
    name: mongodb
    ports:
    - containerPort: 27017

    - mountPath: /data/db
      name: mongodb-data
  volumes:
  - gcePersistentDisk:
      fsType: ext4
      pdName: mongodb
    name: mongodb-data

##### FILE: mongodb-pod-hostpath.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/mongodb-pod-hostpath:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: mongodb-pod-hostpath
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: mongo
    name: mongodb
    ports:
    - containerPort: 27017
      protocol: TCP
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /data/db
      name: mongodb-data
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /tmp/mongodb
    name: mongodb-data

---

##### FILE: mongodb-production-ml.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-production-ml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb-production-ml
  name: mongodb-production-ml
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 0
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb-production-ml
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb-production-ml
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo
        name: mongodb-production-ml
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: mongodb

---

##### FILE: mongodb-pv15.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/PersistentVolume/mongodb-pv-1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: mongodb-pv-1
  namespace: default
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  capacity:
    storage: 1Gi
  local:
    path: /mongodb-storage-class/pv-1
  nodeAffinity:
    required:
      nodeSelectorTerms:
      - matchExpressions:
        - key: kubernetes.io/hostname
          operator: In
          values:
          - worker
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  storageClassName: mongodb-storage-class
  volumeMode: Filesystem

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/PersistentVolume/mongodb-pv:
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: mongodb-pv
  namespace: default
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  capacity:
    storage: 200Mi
  claimRef:
    name: mongodb-pvc-mongodb-0
    namespace: databases
  hostPath:
    path: /data/mongodb

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

  - ReadOnlyMany
  capacity:
    storage: 3Gi
  hostPath:
    path: /mnt/data
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain

##### FILE: mongodb-pvc-pod.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/mongodb:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: mongo
    name: mongodb
    ports:
    - containerPort: 27017
      protocol: TCP
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /data/db
      name: mongodb-data
  volumes:
  - name: mongodb-data
    persistentVolumeClaim:
      claimName: mongodb-pvc

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/mongodb

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/mongodb
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Pod/mongodb failed:
1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/mongodb failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/mongodb failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/mongodb failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Pod/mongodb failed:
1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Pod/mongodb failed:
1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Pod/mongodb failed:
1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Pod/mongodb failed:

##### FILE: mongodb-replicated-sts.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodb-sts:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb-sts
  name: mongodb-sts
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 3
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb-svc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config
        - /etc/mongodb/mongodb.conf
        command:
        - mongod
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongodb/mongodb-community-server:6.0.8-ubi8
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: mongodb-port
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-pvc
        - mountPath: /etc/mongodb
          name: mongodb-config
          readOnly: true
      securityContext:
        runAsUser: 0
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 3
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mongodb-configmap
        name: mongodb-config
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongodb-pvc
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
      storageClassName: local-storage

---

##### FILE: mongodbrestore.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/mongodb-restore:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: mongodb-restore
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - bash
        - -c
        - cat /cred/mongo-certs/tls.crt /cred/mongo-certs/tls.key > /work-dir/mongo.pem;
          cat /cred/cluster-ca/tls.crt /cred/cluster-ca/tls.key > /work-dir/ca.pem;
          mongorestore --host rs0/mongodb:$MONGODB_SERVICE_PORT --username $ADMIN_USER
          --password $ADMIN_PASSWORD --authenticationDatabase admin --ssl --sslCAFile
          /work-dir/ca.pem --sslPEMKeyFile /work-dir/mongo.pem /dump/dump
        env:
        - name: ADMIN_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: user
              name: icp-mongodb-admin
        - name: ADMIN_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: icp-mongodb-admin
        image: $ibm_mongodb_image
        name: icp-mongodb-restore
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /dump
          name: mongodump
        - mountPath: /work-dir
          name: tmp-mongodb
        - mountPath: /cred/mongo-certs
          name: icp-mongodb-client-cert
        - mountPath: /cred/cluster-ca
          name: cluster-ca-cert
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: mongodump
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: cs-mongodump
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp-mongodb
      - name: icp-mongodb-client-cert
        secret:
          secretName: icp-mongodb-client-cert
      - name: cluster-ca-cert
        secret:
          secretName: mongodb-root-ca-cert

---

##### FILE: mongodbrestore1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/mongodb-restore:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: mongodb-restore
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - bash
        - -c
        - cat /cred/mongo-certs/tls.crt /cred/mongo-certs/tls.key > /work-dir/mongo.pem;
          cat /cred/cluster-ca/tls.crt /cred/cluster-ca/tls.key > /work-dir/ca.pem;
          mongorestore --db platform-db --host rs0/icp-mongodb-0.icp-mongodb.<mongo
          namespace>.svc.cluster.local,icp-mongodb-1.icp-mongodb.<mongo namespace>.svc.cluster.local,icp-mongodb-2.icp-mongodb.<mongo
          namespace>.svc.cluster.local --port $MONGODB_SERVICE_PORT --username $ADMIN_USER
          --password $ADMIN_PASSWORD --authenticationDatabase admin --ssl --sslCAFile
          /work-dir/ca.pem --sslPEMKeyFile /work-dir/mongo.pem /dump/dump/platform-db
          --drop
        env:
        - name: ADMIN_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: user
              name: icp-mongodb-admin
        - name: ADMIN_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: icp-mongodb-admin
        image: icr.io/cpopen/cpfs/ibm-mongodb@sha256:16a5587c212963d9b4c323762d89df7d9357decba59369102e10e4bd2ef4ccd2
        name: icp-mongodb-restore
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /dump
          name: mongodump
        - mountPath: /work-dir
          name: tmp-mongodb
        - mountPath: /cred/mongo-certs
          name: icp-mongodb-client-cert
        - mountPath: /cred/cluster-ca
          name: cluster-ca-cert
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: mongodump
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: cs-mongodump
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp-mongodb
      - name: icp-mongodb-client-cert
        secret:
          secretName: icp-mongodb-client-cert
      - name: cluster-ca-cert
        secret:
          secretName: mongodb-root-ca-cert

---

##### FILE: mongodb-restore-job.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/mongodb-restore:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: mongodb-restore
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - |
          echo "Authentification sur GCS."
          gcloud auth activate-service-account --key-file=/etc/gcs-credentials/service-account.json
          echo "Tlchargement du dump..."
          gsutil -m cp gs://backup-mongodb-formation-dyma/dump.gz "/tmp/dump.gz"
          echo "dcompression"
          gunzip /tmp/dump.gz
          echo "restauration de la BDD"
          mongorestore --drop --uri=mongodb://${MONGODB_USER}:${MONGODB_PASSWORD}@${MONGODB_HOST} --archive="/tmp/dump"
          echo "BDD restaure !"
        env:
        - name: MONGODB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-root-password
              name: mongodb
        - name: MONGODB_USER
          value: root
        - name: MONGODB_HOST
          value: mongodb-0.mongodb-headless.default
        image: laurentt/backup-mongodb-gcs
        name: mongodb-backup
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/gcs-credentials
          name: gcs-credentials
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: docker-hub-secret
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      volumes:
      - name: gcs-credentials
        secret:
          secretName: gcs-credentials

---


Mutation:

              name: mongodb

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/mongodb-restore:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: mongodb-restore
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - bash
        - -c
        - cat /cred/mongo-certs/tls.crt /cred/mongo-certs/tls.key > /work-dir/mongo.pem;
          cat /cred/cluster-ca/tls.crt /cred/cluster-ca/tls.key > /work-dir/ca.pem;
          mongorestore --host rs0/mongodb:$MONGODB_SERVICE_PORT --username $ADMIN_USER
          --password $ADMIN_PASSWORD --authenticationDatabase admin /dump/dump
        env:
        - name: ADMIN_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: user
              name: icp-mongodb-admin
        - name: ADMIN_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: icp-mongodb-admin
        image: $ibm_mongodb_image
        name: icp-mongodb-restore
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /dump
          name: mongodump
        - mountPath: /work-dir
          name: tmp-mongodb
        - mountPath: /cred/mongo-certs
          name: icp-mongodb-client-cert
        - mountPath: /cred/cluster-ca
          name: cluster-ca-cert
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: mongodump
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: cs-mongodump
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp-mongodb
      - name: icp-mongodb-client-cert
        secret:
          secretName: icp-mongodb-client-cert
      - name: cluster-ca-cert
        secret:
          secretName: mongodb-root-ca-cert

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Job/mongodb-restore

1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

##### FILE: mongodb-stateful.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mongodb/StatefulSet/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: mongodb
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --dbpath
        - /data/db
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-pv
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-pvc
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongodb-pv
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
      storageClassName: hostpath

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: mongodbstatefullset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to test-ns/StatefulSet/mongod:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongod
  namespace: test-ns
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongod
  serviceName: mongodb-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongod
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - mongod
        - --bind_ip
        - 0.0.0.0
        - --replSet
        - MainRepSet
        image: mongo
        name: mongodbcontainer
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-persistent-storage-claim
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongodb-persistent-storage-claim
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to test-ns/StatefulSet/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: test-ns
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      environment: test
      role: mongo
  serviceName: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        environment: test
        role: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - mongod
        - --replSet
        - rs0
        - --smallfiles
        - --noprealloc
        image: mongo
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-persistent-storage
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-persistent-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

  name: mongodb
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:

      app: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
        selector: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:4.0.17
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: pvc
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: pvc
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
