apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: grade-submission
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: database
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: mongodb
        app.kubernetes.io/name: grade-submission
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo:4.4
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-persistent-storage
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongodb-persistent-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

##### FILE: mongodb-statefulset14.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  persistentVolumeClaimRetentionPolicy:
    whenDeleted: Retain
    whenScaled: Retain
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database-name
              name: mongodb
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database-user
              name: mongodb
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database-password
              name: mongodb
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mogodb-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mogodb-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: custom-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongodb-statefulSet15.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_CONFIG_FILE
          value: /etc/mongo/mongod.conf
        image: mongo:4.4.6
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: mongodb
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data
        - mountPath: /etc/mongo
          name: config-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mongodb-config
        name: config-volume
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongodb-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

##### FILE: mongodb-statefulset2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  serviceName: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - mongod
        - --bind_ip_all
        - --replSet
        - rs0
        image: mongo
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-volume
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/StatefulSet/mongo

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  serviceName: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - mongod
        - --bind_ip_all
        - --replSet
        - rs0
        image: mongo
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-volume
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
      version: v6
  serviceName: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
        version: v6
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - mongod
        - --bind_ip_all
        - --replSet
        - rs0
        image: mongo:6
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-volume
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
      storageClassName: standard

##### FILE: MongoDB-StatefulSet6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      role: mongo
  serviceName: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        role: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - mongod
        - --auth
        - --bind_ip
        - 0.0.0.0
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: mominmongo
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: Aisha1234
        image: mongo
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongodb-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
      storageClassName: hostpath

---

##### FILE: mongodb-statefulset7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ersms-forum/StatefulSet/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: ersms-forum
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: root
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: root
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE
          value: admin
        image: mongo:7.0.2
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27101
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 125m
            memory: 250Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-data

---

##### FILE: mongodb-statefulset8.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to my-mongoapp/StatefulSet/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: my-mongoapp
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

---

kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: grade-submission
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: database
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: mongodb
        app.kubernetes.io/name: grade-submission
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: admin
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: password123
        image: mongo:4.4
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-persistent-storage
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongodb-persistent-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

##### FILE: mongodb-stfset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to databases/StatefulSet/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: databases
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGODB_AUTH_ENABLED
          value: "true"
        - name: MONGODB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: mongo123
        image: bitnami/mongodb:7.0.7
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mongodb-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: client
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 2Gi
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 1001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /bitnami/mongodb
          name: mongodb-pvc
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: setup-mongodb-config
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1001:1001 /bitnami/mongodb
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /bitnami/mongodb
          name: mongodb-pvc
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 511
          items:
          - key: createUser.js
            path: createUser.js
          name: mongodb-cm
        name: setup-mongodb-config
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongodb-pvc
      namespace: databases
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 200Mi
      storageClassName: ""
      volumeName: mongodb-pv

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: mongodb-stfset1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to databases/StatefulSet/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: databases
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGODB_AUTH_ENABLED
          value: "true"
        - name: MONGODB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-root-secrets
        - name: CONSUMER_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongodb-consumer-secret
        - name: CONSUMER_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-consumer-secret
        image: bitnami/mongodb:7.0.7
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mongodb-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: client
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 2Gi
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 1001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /bitnami/mongodb
          name: mongodb-pvc
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: setup-mongodb-config
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1001:1001 /bitnami/mongodb
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /bitnami/mongodb
          name: mongodb-pvc
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 511
          items:
          - key: createUser.js
            path: createUser.js
          name: mongodb-cm
        name: setup-mongodb-config
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongodb-pvc
      namespace: databases
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 200Mi
      storageClassName: ""
      volumeName: mongodb-pv

##### FILE: mongodb-stfset2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to databases/StatefulSet/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: databases
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGODB_AUTH_ENABLED
          value: "true"
        - name: MONGODB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-root-secrets
        - name: CONSUMER_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongodb-consumer-secret
        - name: CONSUMER_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-consumer-secret
        image: bitnami/mongodb:7.0.7
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mongodb-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: client
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 2Gi
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 1001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /bitnami/mongodb
          name: mongodb-pvc
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: setup-mongodb-config
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1001:1001 /bitnami/mongodb
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /bitnami/mongodb
          name: mongodb-pvc
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 511
          items:
          - key: createUser.js
            path: createUser.js
          name: mongodb-cm
        name: setup-mongodb-config
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongodb-pvc
      namespace: databases
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 200Mi
      storageClassName: ""
      volumeName: mongodb-pv

---

##### FILE: mongodb-sts.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb-sts
  serviceName: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb-sts
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: root
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: "3322"
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_name
              name: env-config
        image: mongo:7.0.4
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongo
            - --eval
            - printjson(db.serverStatus())
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: mongodb
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mongodb
          name: pvc
          subPath: data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: pvc
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 4Gi
      storageClassName: standard

---

##### FILE: mongodeployPVC.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: root
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: password
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-pvc

---

##### FILE: mongoexdep_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongoexp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongoexp
  name: mongoexp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongoexp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongoexp
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongosecret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongosecret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: databse_url
              name: mongodep-configmap
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongoexpress
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

---

    app: mongo-express

      app: mongo-express
  template:

    spec:

      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongodb-configmap

##### FILE: mongoexporter.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mymicroservices/Secret/mongodb-exporter-secret:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: mongodb-exporter-secret
  namespace: mymicroservices
stringData:
  MONGO_EXPORTER_PASSWORD: mongodb
  MONGO_EXPORTER_USER: mongodb_exporter
  datasource: mongodb://mongodb_exporter:mongodb@mongodb-server-svc:27017/admin?ssl=false
type: Opaque

---

##### FILE: mongoexporter_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mymicroservices/Deployment/mongo-exporter-dpl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-exporter-dpl
  name: mongo-exporter-dpl
  namespace: mymicroservices
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-exporter
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-exporter
      name: mongo-exporter
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --discovering-mode
        - --compatible-mode
        - --mongodb.direct-connect=false
        env:
        - name: MONGODB_URI
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: datasource
              name: mongodb-exporter-secret
        image: bitnami/mongodb-exporter
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mongo-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9216
          name: metric-port
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: qcloudregistrykey
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext: {}
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

---


Mutation:

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongoexpress-deployment
  namespace: mongodb
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongoexpress
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongoexpress
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          value: mongodb-service
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_PORT
          value: "27017"
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          value: root
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          value: root
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongoexpress
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: mongoexpress

    app: mongo-express

  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret

          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:

##### FILE: mongoexpress-deployment4.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongoexpress-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongoexpress-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app-label: mongoexpress-deployment
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app-label: mongoexpress-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          value: mongodb-service
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: mongo-express-secret
        image: mongo-express:1.0.0-alpha.4
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongoexpress-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongoexpress-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app-label: mongoexpress-deployment
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app-label: mongoexpress-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          value: mongodb-service
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: mongo-express-secret
        image: mongo-express:1.0.0-alpha.4
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

##### FILE: mongoExpress-deployment6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongodb-configmap
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

---

kind: Deployment

    app: mongo-express

  replicas: 1

      app: mongo-express

              key: username
              name: my-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: my-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: my-configmap
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo

      containers:
      - env:

          value: devdb
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: devdb@123
        image: mongo
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-persistant-storage
      volumes:
      - hostPath: null
        name: mongo-persistant-storage
        path: /tmp/dbbackup

##### FILE: mongoServiceDeployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017

kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    for: goalapp
  name: mongodb
  namespace: goalapp
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      db: mongodb
  serviceName: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        db: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: 549825371516.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/mongodb
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: mongodb
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: mongo
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteMany
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 2Gi
      storageClassName: goal-mongo-sc

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to agnost/Deployment/monitor:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: monitor
  name: monitor
  namespace: agnost
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: monitor
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: monitor
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CLUSTER_DB_URI
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: databaseURI
              name: mongodb
        - name: CLUSTER_DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongodb
        - name: CLUSTER_DB_PWD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb
        - name: PASSPHRASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: passPhrase
              name: agnost
        - name: MASTER_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: masterToken
              name: agnost
        - name: NAMESPACE
          value: agnost
        - name: RELEASE_NUMBER
          value: v0.0.2
        image: cloudagnost/monitor:v4
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: monitor
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4000
      serviceAccountName: provisioner-sa

---

  - get
  - list
  - watch

  - watch

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/DaemonSet/metrics-collection-agent:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: metrics-collection-agent
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: metrics-collection-agent
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: metrics-collection-agent
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: ghadeerda/metrics-collection-agent:latest
        name: metrics-collection-agent
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/agent-config
          name: config-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: metrics-agent-config
        name: config-volume

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/ConfigMap/prometheus-server-conf:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  prometheus.yml: |-
    global:
      scrape_interval: 5s
      evaluation_interval: 5s
    scrape_configs:
      - job_name: 'kubernetes-apiservers'
        kubernetes_sd_configs:
        - role: endpoints
        scheme: https
        tls_config:
          ca_file: /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/ca.crt
        bearer_token_file: /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/token
        relabel_configs:
        - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_namespace, __meta_kubernetes_service_name, __meta_kubernetes_endpoint_port_name]
          action: keep
          regex: default;kubernetes;https

      - job_name: 'kubernetes-controller-manager'
        honor_labels: true
        scheme: https
        tls_config:
          ca_file: /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/ca.crt
          insecure_skip_verify: true
        bearer_token_file: /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/token
        static_configs:
          - targets:
            - 127.0.0.1:10257

      - job_name: 'kubernetes-nodes'
        scheme: https
        tls_config:
          ca_file: /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/ca.crt
        bearer_token_file: /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/token
        kubernetes_sd_configs:
        - role: node
        relabel_configs:
        - action: labelmap
          regex: __meta_kubernetes_node_label_(.+)
        - target_label: __address__
          replacement: localhost:6443
        - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_node_name]
          regex: (.+)
          target_label: __metrics_path__
          replacement: /api/v1/nodes/${1}/proxy/metrics

      - job_name: 'kubernetes-cadvisor'
        scheme: https
        tls_config:
          ca_file: /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/ca.crt
        bearer_token_file: /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/token
        kubernetes_sd_configs:
        - role: node
        relabel_configs:
        - action: labelmap
          regex: __meta_kubernetes_node_label_(.+)
        - target_label: __address__
          replacement: localhost:6443
        - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_node_name]
          regex: (.+)
          target_label: __metrics_path__
          replacement: /api/v1/nodes/${1}/proxy/metrics/cadvisor

      - job_name: 'kubernetes-network-policies'
        honor_labels: true
        kubernetes_sd_configs:
        - role: pod
        relabel_configs:
        - action: keep
          source_labels:
          - __meta_kubernetes_namespace
          - __meta_kubernetes_pod_name
          separator: '/'
          regex: 'kube-system/kube-network-policies.+'
        - source_labels:
          - __address__
          action: replace
          target_label: __address__
          regex: (.+?)(\\:\\d+)?
          replacement: $1:9080/metrics
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    name: prometheus-server-conf
  name: prometheus-server-conf
  namespace: monitoring

##### FILE: monitoring31_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Pod/prometheus:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    app: prometheus-server
  name: prometheus
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - --config.file=/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml
    - --storage.tsdb.path=/prometheus/
    - --web.enable-admin-api
    image: prom/prometheus:v2.51.1
    name: prometheus
    ports:
    - containerPort: 9090
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /etc/prometheus/
      name: prometheus-config-volume
    - mountPath: /prometheus/
      name: prometheus-storage-volume
  hostNetwork: true
  nodeSelector:
    node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane: ""
  tolerations:
  - key: CriticalAddonsOnly
    operator: Exists
  - effect: NoSchedule
    key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
  - effect: NoSchedule
    key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
  volumes:
  - configMap:
      defaultMode: 420
      name: prometheus-server-conf
    name: prometheus-config-volume
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: prometheus-storage-volume

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to simple-api/ConfigMap/prometheus:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  prometheus.yml: |
    global:
      scrape_interval: 15s # Set the scrape interval to every 15 seconds. Default is every 1 minute.
      evaluation_interval: 15s # Evaluate rules every 15 seconds. The default is every 1 minute.
      # scrape_timeout is set to the global default (10s).
    scrape_configs:
      # The job name is added as a label `job=<job_name>` to any timeseries scraped from this config.
      - job_name: "simple-api"
        metrics_path: '/actuator/prometheus'
        # scheme defaults to 'http'.
        scrape_interval: 30s # poll very quickly for a more responsive demo
        static_configs:
          - targets: [ "simple-api:8080" ]
            labels:
              application: 'Simple API'
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: prometheus
  namespace: simple-api

    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/listen-ports: '[{"HTTP": 80}, {"HTTPS":443}]'
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/scheme: internet-facing
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "443"
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/target-type: ip
  name: monitoring-ingress
  namespace: monitoring

  rules:
  - host: prometheus.nalraon.kr
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: prometheus-server
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

    http:
      paths:
      - backend:

            name: grafana
            port:
              number: 80

        pathType: Prefix

##### FILE: monitor-ingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/monitor-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/cors-allow-credentials: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/cors-allow-headers: Content-Type, Authorization
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/cors-allow-methods: GET, PUT, POST, DELETE, PATCH,
      OPTIONS
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/cors-allow-origin: '*'
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/enable-cors: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/enable-rewrite-log: "true"
  name: monitor-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: grafana.newcord.kro.kr
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: grafana
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  - host: prometheus.newcord.kro.kr
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: prometheus-server
            port:
              number: 4444
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/monitor:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: monitor
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: monitor
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: monitor
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: emirhanmetin/py-flask:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: monitor
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000

##### FILE: moodle_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/moodle:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: moodle
  name: moodle
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: moodle
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: moodle
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: shared-envs
        image: ceduth/moodle:latest
        name: moodle
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/moodledata
          name: moodle-data
      volumes:
      - name: moodle-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: moodle-pvc

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: moodle-patch-image.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/moodle:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: moodle
  name: moodle
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: moodle
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: moodle
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: ceduth/moodle
        name: moodle

---

##### FILE: morevolumes.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/morevol:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: morevol
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - sleep
    - "3600"
    image: centos:7
    name: centos1
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /centos1
      name: test
  - command:
    - sleep
    - "3600"
    image: centos:7
    name: centos2
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /centos2
      name: test
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: test

---

##### FILE: mosq-depl-with-vol.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mosquitto:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mosquitto
  name: mosquitto
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mosquitto
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mosquitto
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: eclipse-mosquitto:1.6.12
        name: mosquitto
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1883
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/config
          name: mosquitto-config
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/secrets
          name: mosquitto-secret
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mosquitto-config-file
        name: mosquitto-config
      - name: mosquitto-secret
        secret:
          secretName: my-secret

---

##### FILE: mosquito-configmap.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/mosquittoconfig:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  mosquitto.conf: |
    listener 1883
    allow_anonymous true
    log_type debug
kind: ConfigMap

##### FILE: mosquitto10.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to oakestra-network/Deployment/mosquitto:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mosquitto
  namespace: oakestra-network
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mosquitto
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mosquitto
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: eclipse-mosquitto:1.6
        name: mosquitto
        ports:
        - containerPort: 10003
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/config/
          name: config
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/data/
          name: data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - cp
        - /mosquitto/config-init/mosquitto.conf
        - /mosquitto/config/mosquitto.conf
        image: alpine
        name: configsetup
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/config/
          name: config
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/config-init/
          name: init-config
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mosquitto-config
        name: init-config
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mosquitto-data
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: config

---

##### FILE: mosquitto12_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ha/StatefulSet/mosquitto:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mosquitto
  name: mosquitto
  namespace: ha
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mosquitto
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mosquitto
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: eclipse-mosquitto:2.0.18
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mosquitto
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1883
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
            - NET_RAW
            - SYS_ADMIN
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/data
          name: mqtt-01-volume
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/config/mosquitto.conf
          name: mosquitto-config
          subPath: mosquitto.conf
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/config/password.txt
          name: mosquitto-password
          subPath: password.txt
      hostNetwork: true
      volumes:
      - name: mqtt-01-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mqtt-01-vol01
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 448
          name: mosquitto-config
        name: mosquitto-config
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 511
          name: mosquitto-password
        name: mosquitto-password

##### FILE: mosquitto7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mosquitto:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mosquitto
  name: mosquitto
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mosquitto
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mosquitto
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: eclipse-mosquitto:2.0
        name: mosquitto
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1883
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/config
          name: mosquitto-config
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/secret
          name: mosquitto-secret
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mosquitto
  namespace: mqtt
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mosquitto
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mosquitto
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: eclipse-mosquitto:latest
        name: mosquitto
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1883
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/data
          name: mosquitto-storage
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/config/mosquitto.conf
          name: mosquitto-config
          subPath: mosquitto.conf
      volumes:
      - name: mosquitto-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mqtt-pvc
      - configMap:
          name: mosquitto-config
        name: mosquitto-config

##### FILE: mosquitto9.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to oakestra-system/Deployment/mosquitto:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mosquitto
  namespace: oakestra-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mosquitto
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mosquitto
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: eclipse-mosquitto:1.6
        name: mosquitto
        ports:
        - containerPort: 10003
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/config/
          name: config
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/data/
          name: data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - cp
        - /mosquitto/config-init/mosquitto.conf
        - /mosquitto/config/mosquitto.conf
        image: alpine
        name: configsetup
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/config/
          name: config
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/config-init/
          name: init-config
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mosquitto-config
        name: init-config
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mosquitto-data
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: config

---

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to oakestra-system/ConfigMap/mosquitto-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  mosquitto.conf: |2

    #add logging directory
    persistence true
    persistence_location /mosquitto/data/
    log_dest file /mosquitto/log/mosquitto.log

    #listen on port 10003
    listener 10003

    log_type error
    log_type warning
    log_type notice
    log_type information



    #allow anonymous connections
    allow_anonymous true
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: mosquitto-config
  namespace: oakestra-system

##### FILE: mosquitto-config2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/mosquitto-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  mosquitto.conf: |-
    # Ip/hostname to listen to.
    # If not given, will listen on all interfaces
    #bind_address 0.0.0.0

    # Port to use for the default listener.
    port 1883

    # Allow anonymous users to connect?
    # If not, the password file should be created
    allow_anonymous true

    # The password file.
    # Use the `mosquitto_passwd` utility.
    # If TLS is not compiled, plaintext "username:password" lines bay be used
    # password_file /mosquitto/config/passwd
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: mosquitto-config
  namespace: default

---

##### FILE: mosquitto-config-components10_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mosquitto:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mosquitto
  name: mosquitto
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mosquitto
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mosquitto
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: eclipse-mosquitto:1.6.2
        name: mosquitto
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1883
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/config
          name: mosquitto-conf
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/secret
          name: mosquitto-secret
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mosquitto-config-file
        name: mosquitto-conf
      - name: mosquitto-secret
        secret:
          secretName: mosquitto-secret-file

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mosquitto:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mosquitto
  name: mosquitto
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mosquitto
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mosquitto
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: eclipse-mosquitto:1.6.2
        name: mosquitto
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1883
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/config
          name: mosquitto-conf
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/secret
          name: mosquitto-secret
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mosquitto-config-file
        name: mosquitto-conf
      - name: mosquitto-secret
        secret:
          secretName: mosquitto-secret-file

##### FILE: mosquitto-config-components7_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mosquitto:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mosquitto
  name: mosquitto
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mosquitto
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mosquitto
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: eclipse-mosquitto:1.6.2
        name: mosquitto
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1883
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/config
          name: mosquitto-conf
        - mountPath: /mosquitto/secret
          name: mosquitto-secret
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mosquitto-config-file
        name: mosquitto-conf
      - name: mosquitto-secret
        secret:
          secretName: mosquitto-secret-file

---

##### FILE: mount-scripts-configmap.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/mount-scripts:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  ensure_mounted_filestore.sh: |
    #!/bin/sh

    usage() { echo "usage: ${0} -d <device_name> -p <path> -s <sleep_period_between_checks> [-h]" >&2; exit 1; }

    while getopts d:p:s:h flag
    do
        case "${flag}" in
            d) device_name=${OPTARG};;
            p) path=${OPTARG};;
            s) sleep_period=${OPTARG};;
            h) usage;;
            *) usage;;
        esac
    done

    if [ -z "$device_name" ] || [ -z "$path" ] || [ -z "$sleep_period" ]; then
        usage
    fi

    host_path="/host$path"

    echo "Create directory $path if it doesn't exist"
    mkdir -m 755 -p "$host_path"

    mount_virtiofs() {
        mount -t virtiofs -o rw,relatime "$device_name" "$host_path"
        echo "Mounted virtiofs device $device_name to $path"
    }

    ensure_mounted() {
        mount_point_info=$(grep " $host_path " /proc/mounts)
        if [ -z "$mount_point_info" ]; then
            echo "Directory $path is not a mount point, mounting it"
            mount_virtiofs
        else
            echo "Directory $path is already a mount point, checking its options"
            target=$(echo "$mount_point_info" | awk '{print $2}')
            source=$(echo "$mount_point_info" | awk '{print $1}')
            options=$(echo "$mount_point_info" | awk '{print $4}')

            if [ "$target" != "$host_path" ] || \
               [ "$source" != "$device_name" ] || \
               ! echo "$options" | grep -q "rw" || \
               ! echo "$options" | grep -q "relatime"
            then
                echo "Mount options for $path are not correct, remounting it"
                umount "$host_path"
                echo "Unmounted file system from $path"
                mount_virtiofs
            else
                echo "Mount point has correct options"
            fi
        fi
    }

    while true; do
        ensure_mounted
        /bin/sleep $sleep_period
    done
  ensure_mounted_glusterfs.sh: |
    #!/bin/sh

    usage() { echo "usage: ${0} -g <glusterfs_hostname> -p <path> -s <sleep_period_between_checks> [-h]" >&2; exit 1; }

    while getopts g:p:s:h flag
    do
        case "${flag}" in
            g) gluster_hostname=${OPTARG};;
            p) path=${OPTARG};;
            s) sleep_period=${OPTARG};;
            h) usage;;
            *) usage;;
        esac
    done

    if [ -z "$gluster_hostname" ] || [ -z "$path" ] || [ -z "$sleep_period" ]; then
        usage
    fi

    echo "Enter K8S node's namespaces"
    nsenter --target 1 --mount --uts --ipc --net --pid

    echo "Fork process"
    (
        echo "Install GlusterFS client"
        apt-get update && apt-get install -y glusterfs-client=7.2-2build1 || exit

        host_path="/host$path"

        echo "Create directory $path if it doesn't exist"
        mkdir -m 755 -p "$host_path"

        mount_glusterfs() {
            mount -t glusterfs $gluster_hostname:/stripe-volume "$host_path"
            echo "Mounted glusterfs from host $gluster_hostname to $path"
        }

        ensure_mounted() {
            mount_point_info=$(grep " $host_path " /proc/mounts)
            if [ -z "$mount_point_info" ]; then
                echo "Directory $path is not a mount point, mounting it"
                mount_glusterfs
            else
                echo "Directory $path is already a mount point, validating it"
                target=$(echo "$mount_point_info" | awk '{print $2}')
                source=$(echo "$mount_point_info" | awk '{print $1}')
                options=$(echo "$mount_point_info" | awk '{print $4}')

                if [ "$target" != "$host_path" ] || \
                   [ "$source" != "$gluster_hostname:/stripe-volume" ] || \
                   ! echo "$options" | grep -q "rw" || \
                   ! echo "$options" | grep -q "relatime" ||
                   ! stat "$host_path"
                then
                    echo "Mount point $path is not correct, remounting it"
                    umount "$host_path"
                    echo "Unmounted file system from $path"
                    mount_glusterfs
                else
                    echo "Mount point is correct"
                fi
            fi
        }

        while true; do
            ensure_mounted
            /bin/sleep $sleep_period
        done
    )
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: mount-scripts
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: move_editor_role.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/move-editor-role:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kube-kic-tac-toe
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: move-editor-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-kic-tac-toe
  name: move-editor-role
  namespace: default

##### FILE: movie-db-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/movie-db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f docker-compose.yml -o Kube_Manifests/
    kompose.version: 1.31.2 (a92241f79)
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: movie-db
  name: movie-db
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: movie-db
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f docker-compose.yml -o Kube_Manifests/
        kompose.version: 1.31.2 (a92241f79)
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/jenkins-devops-exams-test-default: "true"
        io.kompose.service: movie-db
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: movie_db_dev
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: movie_db_password
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: movie_db_username
        image: postgres:12.1-alpine
        name: movie-db
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgres-data-movie
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: postgres-data-movie
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: postgres-data-movie
status: {}

---

##### FILE: movie-service-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/movie-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f docker-compose.yml -o Kube_Manifests/
    kompose.version: 1.31.2 (a92241f79)
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: movie-service
  name: movie-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: movie-service
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f docker-compose.yml -o Kube_Manifests/
        kompose.version: 1.31.2 (a92241f79)
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/jenkins-devops-exams-test-default: "true"
        io.kompose.service: movie-service
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - uvicorn
        - app.main:app
        - --reload
        - --host
        - 0.0.0.0
        - --port
        - "8000"
        env:
        - name: CAST_SERVICE_HOST_URL
          value: http://cast_service:8000/api/v1/casts/
        - name: DATABASE_URI
          value: postgresql://movie_db_username:movie_db_password@movie_db/movie_db_dev
        image: movie-service
        name: movie-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          hostPort: 8001
          protocol: TCP
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app
          name: movie-service-claim0
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: movie-service-claim0
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: movie-service-claim0
status: {}

---
